attributes.action: child benefit cuts still unfair post 2012 budget
attributes.additional_details:
The Government have still not thought this through. It is still not fair that ONE person earning in excess of £50,000 will have their CB reduced and then stopped after £60,000, whilst two earners each earning under £50,000 (but potentially permitted to bring in up to £99,999 per household p.a) do not lose it.

The Government should set a ceiling of £75,000 p.a per household.
